en: When the earth is shaken with its [final] earthquake
And the earth discharges its burdens
And man says, "What is [wrong] with it?" -
That Day, it will report its news
Because your Lord has inspired [i.e., commanded] it.
That Day, the people will depart separated [into categories]
to be shown [the result of] their deeds.

ar: فَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ خَيْرًا يَرَهُ
en: So whoever does an atom's weight of good will see it,

ar: وَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ شَرًّا يَرَهُ
en: And whoever does an atom's weight of evil will see it.
